subject: Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: The Tribune Company has two bidders, but the effort to sell the Cubs and Wrigley Field (and 25 percent of Comcast SportsNet Chicago) is being complicated by a bankruptcy filing.
snippet: The Tribune Company has two bidders, but the effort to sell the Cubs and Wrigley Field (and 25 percent of Comcast SportsNet Chicago) is being complicated by a bankruptcy filing.
